msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Eastern Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: Spokane County Government; Clerk, Territorial Case Files, 1879-1889

div1.p: TERRITORY OF WASHINGTON, County of Spokane } SS.
In the District Court of the Territory of Washington and for the FirstFourth Judicial District thereof, holding terms at Cheney, Spokane County, in said Territory
To the Sheriff of Lincoln County, Greeting:

IN THE NAME OF THE UNITED STATES, You are hereby commanded to summon Dayton Trussell to be and appear before the District Court aforesaid at the Court House, in Cheney, in said County, on the forthwith day of April A.D. 1885, at o'clock, M. to there give evidence in the above entitiled cause on the part of said Defendant S. P. White
Witness the Hon. George Turner Associate Judge of the Supreme Court of Washington Territory, and Judge of said Court, and the Seal thereof affixed, this 17 day of April A.D. 1885
Kate W. Feuerbach Clerk. By R. Strobach Deputy.
TERRITORY OF WASHINGTON, County of Spokane Lincoln } SS.
I hereby certify that I served the within Subpoena on the within named witness by reading the same to him in said County, on this 23 day of April A.D. 1885

John Cody Sheriff
By J. N. Friedlander Deputy.
In the District Court of the Territory of Washington, and for the First Judicial District thereof, holding Terms at Cheney, Spokane County, in said Territory

Returned and Filed this 28
day of, April A.D. 1885
Kate W. Feuerbach Clerk. By. R. Strobach Deputy.

Sheriff's Fees
Serving 1 names at 40 40
Mileage 4 miles at 10 40
Total, ---$80
